display_long_description:
# Aliens exist — and they love… **Disc Golf?**

**Disc Frenzy** brings the thrill of disc golf straight into VR with fully simulated disc physics, vibrant worlds, and multiplayer.!


- **8 handcrafted courses**, 130+ holes – from seaside sand traps to floating islands - each course offers unique challenges.
[media]

- **Play Your Way — Solo or Multiplayer** – Jump into solo rounds, private lobbies with friends, or public online matches.
Includes Stroke Play, Match Play, Timed Race mode, voice chat, and full crossplay.
[media]

- **True-to-Life Disc Flight** – Every disc uses real Speed, Glide, Turn & Fade values with fully simulated aerodynamics.
Customize weight, size, and stability to build your perfect bag—easy for beginners, deep for veterans.
[media]

- **150+ Unlockables & Hidden Discs** – Earn new patterns and stamps by shooting par or better.
Use your belt-mounted scanner to track down 8 hidden discs in every level.
[media]

- **Movement That Fits Your Style** – Smooth or snap turning, teleport, walking, and full free-climbing for rescue shots or wild routes.
[media]

- **Language Support** – English, French, Spanish, Danish, German, Italian.


Grab your headset, build your dream bag, and master all eight courses. — **will you be Udarvia’s next disc-golf champion**?
